dialogue.speaker: generic
dialogue.text: [Bambi gets a phone call from Dave.]

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: HELLO?!?!

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Hey Bambi, it's Dave. Are you ready for that picnic?

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: WHAT, NO! I'm in the middle of something! There's these two trespassers trying to steal MY corn!

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: By any chance, are these "Trespassers" you're harrassing an equally short couple?

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: Yes... Justifiably!

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: (I didn't think they would show up early...)

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Bambi. They aren't trespassers. I know them.

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: Whaddyumean?

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: I told you this morning, I was planning on inviting a few people to the picnic. They're the "Guests" I was talking about!

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: That doesn't make sense...

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: Huh? What do you... Did you think I was gonna have a picnic with just you? That's weird.

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: Wait... AHA! I think I know what's going on here!

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: These aren't the friends you thought they were, Dave!

dialogue.speaker: dave
dialogue.text: You've got to be kidding me Bambi-

dialogue.speaker: generic
dialogue.text: [Bambi abruptly hangs up on Dave.]

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: Now I know what's really going on here...

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: You two are using Dave's "invite" as an EXCUSE to steal my corn!

dialogue.speaker: gf
dialogue.text: Are you dense?

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: What?

dialogue.speaker: gf
dialogue.text: You heard me, are you dense?

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: How am I dense?

dialogue.speaker: gf
dialogue.text: How could you even assume we're here to steal your corn?

dialogue.speaker: gf
dialogue.text: Who the hell does that?

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: People steal my corn all the time!

dialogue.speaker: gf
dialogue.text: I mean, okay, so that means you can share an instance of that happening?

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: I don't have to give you any of my instances!

dialogue.speaker: gf
dialogue.text: Do you have any instance or not, little man.

dialogue.speaker: bambi
dialogue.text: Little man? What do you mean little man-

dialogue.speaker: gf
dialogue.text: Okay, I'm done. Make him shut up, babe.

dialogue.speaker: bf
dialogue.text: Beep.
